page.title: 13A day in the life of Stuart
page.content: WEDNESDAY My name is Stuart McDonald.I wake up every morning about 8 o'clock,wash and have some Alpen for breakfast. Later,about 8.30am,I brush my teeth. About 8.35am I run down to school. I play football until the bell rings at 9am. I go into the classroom and get my day's assignments. We usually get a page of maths, language, spelling, project,etc. I set to work straight away and finish about 11.30am when I do extra project or another pastime until the bell rings at 12.45pm. I go home and have my lunch of meat, chips and beans,etc. I then brush my teeth and come back to school, and play till the 1.45 bell rings. We all go inside and get changed for a game of football. We march up to the local park and play football for one and a quarter hours.
